subject: Issue with my latest invoice
body: Hi, I just received my invoice for October and it seems higher than usual. Can you please explain why I was charged an extra £25 this month? I haven’t changed my plan or used any additional services as far as I know.

subject: Requesting copy of last month’s invoice
body: Hello, Could you send me a copy of my September invoice? I need it for my records and I can’t find it in my account.

subject: Why is my bill different this month?
body: Hi team, My bill this month is higher and I don’t understand why. I haven’t used additional services. Can someone review my account?

subject: Sudden increase in subscription fee
body: Hello, My subscription fee increased without warning. This is frustrating. Please check and fix quickly.

subject: Clarification needed on usage charges
body: Hi, Can you explain the usage charges on my latest bill? The numbers look different from previous months.

subject: VAT information missing
body: Hi team, My invoice doesn’t show VAT. Can you reissue it with VAT included?

subject: Duplicate invoice received
body: Hello, I received two identical invoices. Do I need to pay both or is it an error?

subject: Incorrect overcharge on my account
body: Hi, You charged me £48 extra. This is unacceptable. Fix this immediately.

subject: Need help updating billing address
body: Hi team, I moved recently and need to update my billing address. Please guide me.

subject: Payment failed notification
body: Hello, I received payment failed notification but my bank shows no issue. Can you check?

subject: App freezes when uploading files
body: Hi, The app freezes every time I upload a file. I need this fixed urgently.

subject: Notifications not working
body: Hello, I’m not receiving any notifications. Settings look fine. What should I try?

subject: Can’t access my account at all
body: Hi support, I’m locked out of my account and get “Access denied.” Fix immediately.

subject: Strange error message
body: Hi, I get an error “Module not found: 0x35.” What does this mean?

subject: Can’t change profile picture
body: Hello, Uploading a new profile picture does nothing. Not urgent.

subject: System keeps logging me out
body: Hi team, The system logs me out every few minutes. Please help.

subject: Wi-Fi not recognized by the app
body: Hi, The app doesn’t recognize my Wi-Fi but the phone works fine.

subject: Video calls not loading
body: Hello, Video calls won’t load and sometimes drop immediately. Fix ASAP.

subject: Slow performance after update
body: Hi team, The app is slower after the latest update. Is this known?

subject: Dark mode won’t turn off
body: Hello, Dark mode is stuck and won’t turn off. How do I reset it?

subject: Critical bug in dashboard
body: Hi, My dashboard is broken and reports don’t load. Fix today.

subject: Audio not working during calls
body: Hi, I can hear others but they can’t hear me. My mic works in other apps.

subject: Requesting a refund for damaged item
body: Hi, My order arrived damaged. I want a refund and instructions to return.

subject: Wrong size received
body: Hello, I ordered medium but received large. Refund or exchange?

subject: My refund hasn’t been processed
body: Hi team, I requested a refund last week but nothing yet. How long does it take?

subject: Refund still missing
body: Hello, You confirmed my refund 5 days ago but I haven’t received it. Check delay.

subject: Refund for digital purchase
body: Hi, I bought the wrong digital item. Can digital purchases be refunded?

subject: Refund for cancelled subscription
body: Hi support, I cancelled my subscription. Am I eligible for refund for unused time?

subject: Still no refund — unacceptable
body: Hi, It’s been over two weeks and still no refund. Fix immediately.

subject: Incorrect item received
body: Hi, I received the wrong product and prefer a refund. How do I return it?

subject: Very disappointed with your service
body: Hi, I am disappointed with your service. This is not acceptable.

subject: Issue unresolved after several days
body: Hello, I reported a problem 3 days ago and nothing changed. Please update me.

subject: Unhelpful previous response
body: Hi, The reply I received was generic and didn’t help. Review my issue.

subject: Account closed without explanation
body: Hello, My account was closed without explanation. Fix immediately.

subject: Incorrect information by support
body: Hi team, I was given wrong information and it caused issues. Please review.

subject: Slow response time
body: Hi, It took days to get a reply. Please respond faster next time.

subject: Waiting for support for a week
body: Hello, It’s been a week with no answer. Poor service. Fix now.

subject: Confusing instructions
body: Hi, Instructions I received were confusing and didn’t work. Need clear steps.

subject: Request to reopen ticket
body: Hello, My previous ticket was closed but issue not solved. Reopen please.

subject: Issue not fixed after multiple emails
body: Hi, Fourth email about same issue. Nothing fixed. Needs urgent attention.

subject: How do I change my account email?
body: Hi team, How can I update the email on my account?

subject: Information about plan features
body: Hello, What are the differences between Standard and Pro plans?

subject: Adding a new user
body: Hi, How do I add a new user to my team account?

subject: Request for API documentation
body: Hello, Do you have a link to your API documentation?

subject: Pausing subscription
body: Hi, Can I pause my subscription temporarily?

subject: Student discount inquiry
body: Hello, Do you offer student pricing?

subject: Exporting account data
body: Hi team, Is there a way to export all my account data?

subject: Integration options
body: Hi, What integration options do you support for Google or Slack?

subject: Updating payment method
body: Hello, How do I update my payment method?

subject: Security features
body: Hi, Do you support two-factor authentication for login?
